snippet: The slow pace of recovery is leading residents and officials to wonder if the county is being overlooked in favor of more populous areas.
abstract: Westchester County residents are frustrated with long waits for gas and slow pace of Hurricane Sandy recovery; more than 100,000 Consolidated Edison and New York State Electric and Gas customers remain without power, though county was spared devastation that was experienced in Rockaways, on Staten Island and on parts of Long Island.
lead_paragraph: The slow pace of recovery is leading residents and officials to wonder if the county is being overlooked in favor of more populous areas.
